name: Chiroform DC Portable Table
descr:
The Chiroform DC student Portable Table available to the best price within the market.

Specifications:

Max working  capacity: 450lbs/204kg
Static weight capacity: 2200 lbs/1000kg
Full length: 66"/168cm including headpiece
Width: 21.5"/55cm
Weight: 37.8lbs/17.2kg
Height range: 47-57cm
Cushion:  2" thick multi-layered Firm-foam system
Upholstery:  Super durable standard PVC upholstering

Standard Features:

-5 Year Limited Warranty
-Fitted height,Narrow shoulder
-Folding leg construction
-Adjustable angled headpiece,Self adjusting lowered arms
-2" thick multi-layered Soft-foam system,Drop chest and pelvic panels
-Adjustable tension,Easy control levers
-Full length piano hinge for extra strength and stability
-Two piece divided adjustable head cushion for secured, yet comfortable patients.
-Firm yet lightweight aluminum leg frame
-2" thick multi-layered sponge system
-Paper roll holder/cutter
-Adjustable ankle support
-inclusive black carrying bag
